ModMetaData.name: AuroranKingslayer's RimWorld of the Dragon (Addon for Dragon's Descent)
ModMetaData.author: AuroranKingslayer
ModMetaData.description: The House of the Dragon stands strong. Winter is coming, and so are the zaldrizoti of ancient Valyria. Will you take what is yours with fire and blood? BETA RELEASE Dependencies Harmony is required Dragon's Descent is required Giddy Up! Core is highly suggested Cyber Fauna is highly suggested Special Credit Special credit Credit to Onyxae and their wonderful and inspirational mod, Dragon's Descent, that this project is an addon for. Because this project works off of the framework of Dragon's Descent code, using their mod is a must. Credit to OttersHoldHands for being a developer of Dragon's Descent and a great source of assistance throughout the development process. I couldn't have done it without their help. Credit to all other devs on the DD team for their effort in making such a lovely mod. Credit to GRRM and ASOIAD/GOT/HOTD franchise for the characters depicted within the mod. Dragon's Descent found here https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2026992161 Enjoy!
